name: Tax Report for WooCommerce
author: Infosoft Consultants

sections.description:
LIVE DEMO | PRO VERSION LINK

plugins.infosofttech.com presents WooCommerce Tax Report Lite version

Dashboard shows Tax Summaries – Total Tax, Shipping Tax, Todays Tax, Todays Shiping Tax, Tax Name wise Summary, Recent Orders

Tax Detail Report shows Order wise tax details, Report can be filtered by Date.

Additional Features in Pro Version:
Tax detail report summary by City, State, Country, Tax, Zipcode. Detail report of Orders along with various filters like Date Range, Product, Category, Country, State, Coupon wise, List of Recent Orders, All the data can be exported to Excel, CSV.

Click here to know more about Pro Version
sections.installation:
• Install the plugin from the ‘Plugins’ section in your dashboard (Go to Plugins > Add New > Search and search for ‘WooCommerce Tax Report’).
  • Alternatively, you can download the plugin from the repository. Unzip it and upload it to the plugins folder of your WordPress installation (wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation).
  • Activate it through the ‘Plugins’ section.
  • Access the settings page from WordPress backend under Woo Tax Report.
sections.faq:
Can you customize plug-in for any custom requirements?

Yep!

short_description: Tax Report for WooCommerce Plugin shows Tax summaries and Shipping Tax Summaries, Tax detail report shows each Order wise tax details.
